thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Willis Towers Watson Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.84

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Willis Towers Watson Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.84
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Willis Towers Watson Plc:
* WILLIS TOWERS WATSON REPORTS STRONG FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.21 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.84 * Q4 REVENUE $2.1 BILLION * INCURRED ONE-TIME TAX BENEFIT OF $204 MILLION RELATED TO U.S. TAX REFORM IN QUARTER
* FOR 2018, THE COMPANY EXPECTS CONSTANT CURRENCY REVENUE GROWTH OF AROUND 3%, AND 4% ON AN ORGANIC BASIS
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IN THE RANGE OF $9.88 TO $10.12
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.11, REVENUE VIEW $1.98 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $9.79 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
